properties.displayName: Remote Access Tool - ScreenConnect Installation Execution
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "e=Access&" and ProcessCommandLine contains "y=Guest&" and ProcessCommandLine contains "&p=" and ProcessCommandLine contains "&c=" and ProcessCommandLine contains "&k="

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to a system.
